meanings.definition: A hard, brittle, bluish-white metallic element that is one of the platinum metals.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of osmium in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Jenny admired the shiny osmium jewelry in the store window.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the osmium figurine on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as unyielding as osmium in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The osmium coin gleamed under the bright sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A dense, lustrous, bluish-white metallic element, used in alloys and in the manufacture of electrical filaments.
meanings.sent1: The factory worker carefully handled the osmium to create the new alloy.
meanings.sent2: The electrician needed osmium for the specialized electrical components.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand was made of shimmering osmium, adding to the illusion.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and precious as osmium in the dim room.
meanings.sent5: The osmium wire conducted electricity efficiently, powering the entire system.
